scripts.dev: pm2 delete all || true && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --watch && pm2 logs
scripts.start: pm2 delete all || true && npx prisma generate && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start ecosystem.config.js && pm2 logs
scripts.build:ui: rm -rf ./dist && cd ../client && npm run build && cp -r ./dist ../server
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m rebuild && git push
